aboutMeDescription: Hello! I'm Limber MartÃ­nez, a web development enthusiast with a focus on frontend.

accordion1.title: My Journey in Web Development
accordion1.content: My interest in programming began in 2020 when I started a food delivery project from supermarkets (doliefero). This experience led me to learn technologies like WordPress, Shopify, and dive into HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also became familiar with server management and the importance of SEO and digital marketing for the success of a web project.

accordion2.title: Solid Foundation
accordion2.content: My education at the ILS Institut fÃ¼r Lernsysteme in Hamburg provided me with a solid foundation in frontend technologies like HTML, CSS, and JS, along with a deep understanding of German web development regulations, including AGBs (Terms and Conditions), Impressum (Legal Notice), and Datenschutz (Data Protection Policies).

accordion3.title: Specialization and Learning
accordion3.content: At the National Technological University (UTN) in Argentina, I strengthened my frontend development skills with React and Angular and gained basic knowledge in backend development with NodeJS.

accordion4.title: Continuous Learning
accordion4.content: My recent participation in the Oracle One Altura Education Alura program introduced me to Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, JPA, and the agile Scrum methodology.
